name: Chilli Pickle

menu_categories.name: Fast food
menu_categories.description: Choose fast food, don't waste your time.

menu_categories.name: Street Snacks & Starters
menu_categories.description: Start your meal the best way you can with a great starter. Make your own Gol Gappa (how to on Instagram TV), nibble on a crisp poppadom or order everything & have a feast! WARNING! Our Onion Bhajis are very addictive

menu_categories.name: Modifiers
menu_categories.description: Category that holds all items used as modifiers

menu_categories.name: ✨Meal Deals✨
menu_categories.description: A selection of different meals for one.

menu_categories.name: Biryanis
menu_categories.description: Biryani's have always been one of our best sellers and for good reason. A traditionally cooked, flavoursome rice dish that never disappoints.

menu_categories.name: The Chilli Pickle BBQ
menu_categories.description: The Chillli Pickle BBQ offers the best of our kebabs marinated and cooked over hot coals. Your own BBQ at home without all the hassle!

menu_categories.name: Curries
menu_categories.description: Our selection of individual curries. Build your meal - choose your curry add some snacks and sides for a great way to have it all!

menu_categories.name: Sides
menu_categories.description: A great selection of sides that match perfectly with our main courses, spice up your dishes your a zingy pickle or complete your meal with our comforting Dal

menu_categories.name: Kids
menu_categories.description: Just because you're a kid doesn't mean you don't love tasty food! Our Kid's meal is just a flavoursome as the rest of our menu, just a bit smaller and no spice. Your curry will be served with rice, bread, chutney, riatta and some sweets.

menu_categories.name: Soft Drinks
menu_categories.description: Some classics alongside some traditional Indian favourites

menu_categories.name: Beer
menu_categories.description: What's a curry without a beer? Crisp and classic Kingfisher or a full bodied IPA and more.

menu_categories.name: Wine
menu_categories.description: Our wines have been specially picked for their ability to pair well with full flavoured and spicy foods.

menu_modifier_groups.name: Why not try these with your dish?

The perfect meal for one. Choose your curry and the rest we will do! Your Curry of choice all comes with snacks (samosa and onion Bhaji), rice, tarka dal, pickle, chutney and pappad 

All our packaging is recyclable or compostable.
menu_items.name: Chilli Pickle Curry Combo

menu_items.description:
Chicken breast pieces marinated and baked in the tandoor and finished in a rich tomato butter gravy with crushed fenugreek, smoked pepper, garam masala & fresh butter. The ulitimate butter chicken - if you ask us!!
The ultimate butter chicken – we think.
menu_items.name: Old Delhi Tandoori Fenugreek Butter Chicken (GF)

menu_headers.header:
"Best Indian" as voted at doo Restaurant Awards! Our service brings the experience of The Chilli Pickle Restaurant to your home. 
We are committed to ensuring the safety of our customers and team meaning you can have a great Chilli Pickle experience in the comfort and safety of your own home. Stay Home. Stay Safe.

menu_footnotes.footnote: All dishes may contain traces of the following allergens: Gluten, Crustaceans, Eggs, Fish, Peanuts, Soybeans, Milk, Nuts (e.g. almonds, hazelnuts, walnuts, cashews, pecan nuts, Brazil nuts, pistachio nuts, macadamia nuts), Celery, Mustard, Sesame, Sulphur dioxide/sulphites, Lupin, Molluscs. For any questions regarding the allergen contents of specific dishes please contact the restaurant directly.
All of the menu prices you see on doo are set by our restaurant partners. Some of the prices in this menu have been set at a higher price than you'll find at the table.
If you have any allergies or require specific changes to your order please contact the restaurant - 01273900384 - Reference your order number.

countrywide_allergy_warnings:

For any questions regarding the allergen contents of specific dishes please contact the restaurant directly.
